Event.Message: Driver Management concluded the process to install driver %1 for Device Instance ID %4 with the following status: %9.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriverVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriverProvider" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceInstanceID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SetupClass" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="RebootOption" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="UpgradeDevice" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="IsDriverOEM" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="InstallStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DriverDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Driver Management concluded the process to remove driver %1 from Device Instance ID %4 with the following status: %9.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriverVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriverProvider" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceInstanceID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SetupClass" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="RebootOption" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="UpgradeDevice" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="IsDriverOEM" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="InstallStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DriverDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Driver Management has concluded the process to add Service %1 for Device Instance ID %3 with the following status: %6.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ServiceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriverFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceInstanceID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PrimaryService" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="UpdateService" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="AddServiceStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Driver Management has concluded the process to remove Service %1 for Device Instance ID %3 with the following status: %6.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ServiceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriverFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceInstanceID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PrimaryService" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="UpdateService" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="AddServiceStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
